title: NHAI gives one-month extension to FASTag users to comply with the KYC norms
description: The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has extended the compliance deadline for the 'One Vehicle, One FASTag' initiative to March-end, providing an additional month for FASTag users to complete know-your-customer (KYC) norms. The extension aims to address issues faced by Paytm FASTag users who are already grappling with getting new FASTags following RBI's announcement that they will become non-functional after March 15.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
